description:
At Lake Shibire, Rin gives Nadeshiko a scare with the story of a monster that may or may not live in the water. They have trouble starting the fire for the barbecue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Night on the Lake Shore and Campers
Kohan no Yoru to Camp no Hitobito
Une nuit au bord du lac et des campeuses
湖畔の夜とキャンプの人々
